New Records: Zach LaVine's streak of 30-point games hits a career-high 5
Nikola Vučević recorded his 182nd double-double with the Bulls, surpassing Michael Jordan's 180
Key Match Events: Zach LaVine scored 33 points in 33 minutes
Lonzo Ball recorded six straight games with at least two steals
Lonzo Ball made four 3-pointers and finished with 12 points
Post-Match Reflections: Zach LaVine expressed that his scoring looks easy but is a result of hard work and muscle memory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls recorded 39 assists on 53 baskets in the win
The Bulls improved to 8-11 at home and are two games ahead of the Philadelphia 76ers for the final play-in spot in the East
